name: Squishy (itsmyshowproductions)
description:
SQUISHY!

After being invaded by Technologically Advanced Aliens, the Squishy Race faces extinction.

It is up to you, along with the mystical powers of the Elder Squishy Pap Pap to Resurrect your friends and save the planet!

FREE your friends Spirits from their robotic captors and RESURRECT them.

BANISH your foes, and tell them they are not welcome here no more!

Hand Drawn characters digitized and combined with water-colour painting to showcase the unique style of the Squishy-verse.

In-House SFX and Music crafted by a guy named Gabe.

Hand drawn characters and painting by Megs.
